SEQUENCE.COMMENT: Invalid content in ProductID. When the ProductID is blank or has unexpected content

INVOKE.COMMENT: Send Invalid ProductID values to catch block.

Values.value: Invalid Product IDs or Invalid combination of Product IDs - GetPremium/lName/GetPremium/DataArea/ProductList[0]/ProductID contains %GetPremium/lName/GetPremium/DataArea/ProductList[0]/ProductID% and GetPremium/lName/GetPremium/DataArea/ProductList[1]/ProductID contains %GetPremium/lName/GetPremium/DataArea/ProductList[1]/ProductID% .The Product ID should be BOP/EO/CGL.
